text: But he's a lot older, isn't he? I suppose so. What attracts you? It can't be physical? Of course not! I love him for what he is - he's so great I'm a bit scared of him - a woman must be a bit scared to be really in love. That's why you could never love me?
handwritten_text: But he's a lot older, isn't he? I suppose so. What attracts you? It can't be physical? Of course not! I love him for what he is - he's so great I'm a bit scared of him - a woman must be a bit scared to be really in love. That's why you could never love me?
